title: tatvamariya
sahitya:
tatvamariya taramA mUlAdhAra gaNapatE surapatE unadu


anupallavi

  sathvaguNamum jIva dayaiyum jnAnamum shaTrumilAda kirAdanukkunadu


caraNam    madhura paripUrNa mOdaka karanE mahA vighna vana kutAra varanE
nidhi onbadum anbarkkaruL paranE nikhila carAchara bIjAnguranE
matishEkharan maganE sumukhanE mada vAraNa muganE
shruti mudiviNarvaru cit-paranE-guha sOdaranE rAmadAsakkunadu
